basics.name: Lampros Papadimitriou
basics.label: Full-stack software developer
basics.summary: Software engineer focused on Web & Mobile technologies. Particularly interested in software development, system integration and service delivery. Great experience in J2EE and Spring Technologies. Delivering solutions routing and IPTV platforms and implementing solutions for backend infrastructure.

work.name: Deutsche Apotheker- und Ärztebank eG
work.description: Deutsche Apotheker- und Ärztebank is affiliated to the National Association of German Cooperative Banks (BVR). It offers its services primarily to members of medical professions like physicians, dentists, psychotherapists and pharmacists, their relatives, professional associations of medical professions as well as company clients from the health care industry.
work.summary: Worked in a new development team for building extensions and web applications on top of an already existing banking solution
highlights: Build a team for developing extensions on an already existing banking core platform
Build pipelines automations for delivering software products
Develop applications for mortgages and credits in frontend and backend parts

work.name: Check24 Vergleichsportal Baufinanzierung GmbH
work.description: Check24 is one of the biggest comparison portals in Germany for insurances, finances, enenrgy and telecommunications
work.summary: Worked in small feature teams as feature team lead and developer in frontend and backend area.
highlights: Supported small feature teams using agile approaches
Developed backend Java applications using Java 8 and Spring Boot
Working experience on the following technologies: Java, Javascript, Sass, bower, gulp, Spring framework, gradle, AngularJS, ElasticSearch

work.name: Tyntec GmbH
work.description: Tyntec is a worldwide SMS aggregator and provider located in Germany
work.summary: Working as Java software developer in small teams using agile approaches
highlights: Extended an already existing administration tool
Refactor applications using clean code principals
Extended an already existing monitoring tool using diragrams and graphs
Developed web applications using JSF, Primefaces, AngularJS

work.name: Ericsson Hellas
work.description: Ericsson is a Swedish multinational networking and telecommunications company headquartered in Stockholm. The company offers services, software and infrastructure in information and communications technology
work.summary: Working as external consultant for Ericsson and developing web solutions in IPTV and telecommunication branch
highlights: Implement customizations on an already existing IPTV platform
Implement customizations on an already existing media service delivery platform
Develop software solutions using Java, Spring, JavaEE, JSF, GWT
Develop web applications using Javascript, HTML, CSS
